title: 820-4924 shorted on C1910
message:
I have an 820-4924 was shorted on C1910 after water damage, i also repaired some broken traces next to SMC. but now I have an 0.02Amp consumption (what this problem called ?)
now i think the PCH is not turning on, what signals show up when the PCH is ok ?
PPVTRC_g3h 3.3V

Thank you

title: 820-4924 shorted on C1910
message:
PCH requires (4) RTC signals first; check RTC block on page 12.
Next, go to System Power Management block on page 13.

title: 820-4924 shorted on C1910
message: SMC problem, replaced it working thanks
